content.description: Starts with match and right heel hook on the crimp rail, lock off and rock body to gain momentum for HUGE dynamic left throw to nice hueco on the opposite side of the bulge/pillar and proceed to top out.
content.location: Start directly in the middle of the boulder on the bulge/pillar formation on crimping rail.

content.description: This boulder is hidden in a shallow grassy valley just behind the Lost Boulder. The boulder itself is pretty well hidden due to the vast vegetation that surrounds it. You'll know you have found it when you come upon it, it's covered with old wasp nests that look like honeycombs, and a unique pillar like formation in the center of the boulder.
